sortDeclaration.name: Alarm
sortDeclaration.documentation: Represents an alarm of the smart phone. Alarms can be configured activated.

sortDeclaration.name: Task
sortDeclaration.documentation: Represents a task in the smart phone. A task can be created and configured with a name, reminder and time.

sortDeclaration.name: EMailAddress
sortDeclaration.documentation: An email-address that can be used as receiver of emails.

sortDeclaration.name: EMailAccount
sortDeclaration.documentation: Represents an email account that can be mailed from. If at least one email-account 'acc' exists in the initial state at least one of them should be selected by default with the initial state feature selected(acc)

sortDeclaration.name: Appointment
sortDeclaration.documentation: Represents an appointment of the smart phone. Appointments are created for a specific location and time and can also be specified with a name. They can be set to show a reminder.

sortDeclaration.name: Contact
sortDeclaration.documentation: Represents a contact of the smart phone. A contact can be created and configured with a name, picture, email-address, office and mobile-number. Associated with every contact is a Contactable. A contact can be added as favourite.

sortDeclaration.name: Contactable
sortDeclaration.documentation: Represents any person or company that can be contacted by phone, email or sms. A contactable can be added as contact to the phone. About every contactable a email-address, office, and mobile-number can be known. A contactable can receive information via a message.

sortDeclaration.name: Selectable
sortDeclaration.documentation: An object that can be selected in a menu in the smart phone.

sortDeclaration.name: Creatable
sortDeclaration.documentation: An object that can be created inside the smart phone.

sortDeclaration.name: Message
sortDeclaration.documentation: A message can be used to transfer information from the smart phone to a contactable.

sortDeclaration.name: Information
sortDeclaration.documentation: An information that can be transfered from the smart phone user to a contactable via a message.

relationDeclaration.name: inUse
relationDeclaration.documentation: A creatable may only be created and configured once. When the configuration of a creatable is started it is set to be 'inUse'. It cannot be configurated if it is already 'inUse'.

relationDeclaration.name: isSet_Contact.Picture
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that a picture was set for the contact. To get the associated picture use the relation associated_Picture.

relationDeclaration.name: hasInformation_Regular
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that the contactable has an information.

relationDeclaration.name: haveInformation_Regular
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that the smart phone-user has an information.

relationDeclaration.name: haveInformation_Contactable
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that the smart phone-user has an information about a contactable.

relationDeclaration.name: inMode_People.ReadyToAddFavourite
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that the smart phone is in the peoples-menu and the little plus-symbol on the right side has been selected.

relationDeclaration.name: selected_Favourite
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that the contact is a favourite and was selected in the people-mode.

relationDeclaration.name: selected_AddAsFavourite
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that a contact is selected in the 'add as favourite'-dialog.

relationDeclaration.name: selected_FavouriteNumber
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that a favourite number was selected for the creation of a favourite.

relationDeclaration.name: isFavourite
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that a contact was added as a favourite.

relationDeclaration.name: inMode_People.FavouriteSelected
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that the smart phone is in the peoples-menu and one of the contacts from the right side has been selected.

relationDeclaration.name: hasInformation_Contactable
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that the first contactable has an information about the second contactable.

relationDeclaration.name: created
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that the creation of a creatable was finished i.e. by pressing the 'ok'-button in a configuration menu.

relationDeclaration.name: haveSent
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that the smart phone-user sent the message and can therefore not attach information to it anymore or send it again.

relationDeclaration.name: hasReceived
relationDeclaration.documentation: Denotes that the message was received by the contactable who is therefore able to extract information from it.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: create_NewTask
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Creates a new task.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: configure_Task
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Configures a task.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: configure_Alarm
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Configures the alarm with the given date.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: set_Alarm
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Goes to alarm-mode and configures an alarm for the given date.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: activate_Alarm
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Activates an alarm by setting the check mark for the alarm.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: create_NewContact
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Creates a new contact for the given contactable.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: create_Contact
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Creates a contact for the given contactable by first entering contacts-mode and then creating the new contact.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: create_Task
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Creates a task by first entering task-mode and then creating the new task.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: create_Appointment
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Creates an appointment for the given location and date by first entering calender-mode and then creating the new appointment.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: create_NewAppointment
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Creates a new appointment for the given date and location.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: configure_Appointment
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Configures the appointment with the given date and location.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: select_EMail.EMailAccount
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Select the given email-account in the email-mode.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: configure_Contact
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Configures the contact for the given contactable.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: transferMessage
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Transfers a message to the contactable by first attaching multiple information to it, then sending the message via call, sms or email and then extracting multiple information from it.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: contact
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Contacts the contactable and sends him the message by calling or sending an sms or an email to him.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: call
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Calls the contactable and transfers the message to him. The message may not have been send yet.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: select_People.AddFavourite.Contact
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Select the given contact to add as favourite.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: add_Favourite
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Enters people-mode and adds the given contact as a favourite. To do this the contact has to be created and reachable.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: add_NewFavourite
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Adds the given contact as a favourite. To do this the contact has to be created and reachable.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: select_People.Favourite
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Selects the contact which is a favourite and associated with the given contactable from the people-mode.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: select_Contacts.Details.Number
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Call the contactable associated with the contact by selecting either the office or mobile-number set for the contact.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: select_Contacts.ContactForContactable
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: From the contacts-mode select the contact that is associated with the contactable.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: select_People.AddFavourite.FavouriteNumber_WithoutPicture
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Selects the favourite number for a contact that has no associated picture. Goes to picture selection-mode.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: select_People.AddFavourite.FavouriteNumber_WithPicture
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Selects the favourite number for a contact that has an associated picture. Ends the addition of a contact as a favourite.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: extractsInformation
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Extracts the information from the message for the receiving contactable.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: attachMultipleInformation
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Attaches multiple information to the message.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: extractsMultipleInformation
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Extracts multiple information for the receiver from the message.

taskSchemaDeclaration.name: attachInformation
taskSchemaDeclaration.documentation: Attaches the information to the message.
